tuv.seg: Better Energy Homes Scheme
Scéim um Thithe Fuinnimh níos Fearr
The Better Energy Homes Scheme provides grants to homeowners to improve energy efficiency in their homes
Soláthraíonn an Scéim um Thithe Fuinnimh níos Fearr deontais d’úinéirí tí áirithe chun éifeachtacht fuinnimh a fheabhsú ina gcuid tithe
Landlords and owners of more than one property can also apply for a grant under the scheme
Is féidir le tiarnaí talún agus le h-úinéirí a bhfuil níos mó ná teach amháin acu iarratas a dhéanamh ar dheontas faoin scéim freisin
It is administered by the Sustainable Energy Authority of Ireland (SEAI)
Is é Údarás Fuinneamh Inmharthana Éireann (ÚFIÉ) a riarann an scéim
Grants are available for the following energy-saving work:
Is féidir deontas a fháil don obair seo a leanas a bhaineann le coigilt fuinnimh:
• Wall insulation - for example, cavity wall, internal dry lining or external insulation
• Insliú balla - mar shampla, balla cuasach, tirimlíneáil inmheánach nó insliú seachtrach
• Installation of a high-efficiency boiler (more than 90% efficiency) including a heating controls upgrade
• Athsholáthar ar choire ardéifeachtachta (níos mó ná éifeachtacht 90%) lena n-áirítear uasghrádú ar rialtáin teasa
• A Building Energy Rating (BER) after the energy-saving work is carried out (you must get this BER to qualify for the grant)
• Rátáil Fuinnimh an Fhoirgnimh (BER) tar éis a ndéantar an obair choigilte fuinnimh - tá an BER seo riachtanach chun deontas a fháil
See the Application Guide (pdf) for summary performance requirements under each of these measures
Féach an Treoirleabhar Feidhme (pdf) le haghaidh achoimre ar riachtanais feidhmíochta maidir le gach ceann de na bearta sin
Your contractor(s) must carry out the works in accordance with detailed standards set out in the Contractor Code of Practice and Technical Specification (pdf)
Ní mór do chonraitheoir(í) an obair a dhéanamh de réir na gcaighdeán mionsonraithe atá leagtha amach i gCód Cleachtais agus Sonraíochta Teicniúil Conraitheoirí (pdf)
SEAI publishes detailed FAQs about the Better Energy Homes Scheme
Tá Ceisteanna Coitianta mionsonraithe maidir leis an Scéim na dTithe um Fhuinneamh níos Fearr foilsithe ag Údarás Fuinneamh Inmharthana Éireann (ÚFIÉ)
You must have grant approval before you buy materials or start any grant-funded energy-saving work
Caithfidh tú an deontas a bheith ceadaithe duit sula gceannaíonn tú ábhar ar bith nó sula gcuireann tú tús le hobair choigilte fuinnimh ar bith atá cuimsithe ag an deontas
If you have already started work, you will not be eligible for a grant
Má tá tús curtha agat le hobair cheana féin, ní bheidh tú incháilithe do dheontas
The grant approval remains valid for 6 months after the date it is issued
Maireann faomhadh ar an deontas ar feadh 6 mhí i ndiaidh an dáta eisiúna
However, a before BER can be done ahead of grant approval and could prove useful if you are uncertain about your energy-saving options or what to get done first

Mar sin féin, is féidir an BER roimh obair a dhéanamh sula gceadaítear an deontas agus d’fhéadfadh a leithéid a bheith úsáideach mura bhfuil tú cinnte faoi roghanna coigilte fuinnimh nó cad atá le déanamh i dtús báire
To qualify for a grant you must:
Le bheith incháilithe do dheontas caithfidh tú:
• Be the owner of a dwelling built before 2006
• A bheith mar úinéir teaghaise a tógadh roimh 2006
• Use a contractor from SEAI’s registered list
• Conraitheoir a úsáid ó liosta cláraithe ÚFIÉ
• Use newly fitted materials and products
• Úsáid a bhaint as ábhair agus as earraí a feistíodh as an nua
• Have work done that complies with the required standards
• Obair a chomhlíonann na caighdeáin riachtanacha a chinntiú
• Have a BER carried out after the works are done
• BER a dhéanamh i ndiaidh críche na hoibreacha
• Use a BER assessor from SEAI’s National Register
• Measúnóir BER ó liosta cláraithe ÚFIÉ a úsáid
You may not get a grant if:
Ní bhfaighidh tú deontas más rud é:
• You are replacing your existing boiler with a typical efficiency boiler of less than 90% efficiency
• Go bhfuil do choire reatha á athsholáthar agat le coire éifeachtachta coitianta a bhfuil níos lú ná 90% éifeachtacht ag baint leis
• You replace your boiler but do not replace the heating controls
• Go bhfuil athsholáthar déanta ar an gcoire, ach gan athsholáthar ar bith déanta ar na rialtáin teasa
• The measures do not comply with the required standards
• Nach gcloínn an obair leis na caighdeáin chuí
• The relevant measure (the work on your home) was already incentivised under another grant programme
• Go bhfuil an obair clúdaithe faoi íocaíocht ar bith a fuarthas faoi scéim eile deontais
How to find out if your home would benefit from energy-saving work
Conas fáil amach an mbainfeadh do theach leas as obair choigilte fuinnimh
You can use the Home Energy Self Survey to identify areas in your home which could be improved to increase its energy efficiency
Is féidir leat Féinsuirbhé Baile a dhéanamh chun réimsí a aithint i do theach a bhféadfaí feabhas a chur orthu chun éifeachtacht fuinnimh a fheabhsú
You can also get a Building Energy Rating (BER) done in advance of any works
Is féidir leat Rátáil Fuinnimh an Fhoirgnimh (BER) a mheasúnú freisin
A BER assessor will energy rate your home and provide you with an advisory report, which will help identify areas that could be improved to increase the energy efficiency of your home
Déanfaidh measúnóir BER rátáil fuinnimh ar do theach agus tabharfaidh sé tuairisc chomhairleach duit, a chabhróidh leat réimsí a aithint atá le feabhsú chun éifeachtacht fuinnimh a mhéadú
In general, you will not need planning permission for the measures that are grant-aided under this scheme, though you may require it for external wall insulation

Go ginearálta, ní bheidh cead pleanála ag teastáil le haghaidh obair a fhaigheann cúnamh deontais faoin scéim, ach d’fhéadfadh cead pleanála a bheith ag teastáil maidir le hinsliú an bhalla seachtraigh
This will depend on matters such as whether the insulation will affect the external appearance of the building or whether the building is a protected structure
Beidh an riachtanas maidir le cead pleanála ag brath ar roinnt rudaí, mar shampla, cibé an mbeidh tionchar ar chuma seachtrach an fhoirgnimh nó cibé an struchtúr atá faoi chosaint an foirgneamh
Contact your local authority to check if you need planning permission
Déan teagmháil le d’údarás áitiúil chun fáil amach an bhfuil cead pleanála ag teastáil
Getting the work done safely
Obair shábháilte a chinntiú
Under the Regulations governing safety, health and welfare at work, homeowners are obliged to ensure that construction work on their home is carried out by competent people

Faoi na Rialacháin a dhéanann rialú ar chúrsaí sábháilteachta, sláinte agus leasa san áit oibre, ní mór d’úinéirí tí a chinntiú gur daoine inniúil a dhéanann obair thógála ar bith a dhéantar ar a dteach
Read more, including a guide for homeowners (pdf) and some Frequently Asked Questions, on the website of the Health and Safety Authority
Tá tuilleadh le léamh faoi seo ar láithreán gréasáin an Údaráis Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta, idir an Treoirleabhar le haghaidh Úinéirí Tí (pdf) agus cuid de na Ceisteanna Coitianta
As well as getting a grant under the Better Energy Homes Scheme, you may be able to claim a tax credit on part of the cost of the work
Chomh maith le deontas a fháil faoin Scéim na dTithe um Fhuinnimh níos Fearr, seans go mbeidh tú in ann creidmheas cánach a éileamh ar chuid de chostas na hoibre
Read more in our document on the Home Renovation Incentive and in these FAQs published by Revenue
Tá tuilleadh le léamh faoi seo sa doiciméad dár gcuid a bhaineann leis an Dreasacht Athchóirithe Tí agus sna Ceisteanna Coitianta seo arna bhfoilsiú ag na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim
Grants are paid after the work is completed and you have paid your contractor
Íoctar deontais tar éis don obair a bheith curtha i gcrích agus conraitheoir a bheith íoctha agat
Applications received from specific offshore islands are eligible for 50% additional grant support
Bíonn iarratais a fhaightear ó oileáin ar leith amuigh ón gcósta incháilithe do 50% breise de chúnamh deontais
If the cost of the work (including VAT) is less than the maximum grant amount, you will get a grant for the actual cost of the work
Má bhíonn costas na hoibre (lena n-áirítear CBL) níos lú ná uasmhéid an deontais, gheobhaidh tú deontas do chostas iarbhír na hoibre
If you are claiming a tax credit under the Home Renovation Incentive, the amount of expenditure that qualifies for the credit will be reduced, as outlined in this FAQ
Má tá creidmheas cánach á éileamh agat faoin Dreasacht Athchóirithe Tí, déanfar an méid caiteachais atá incháilithe le haghaidh creidmheas a laghdú, mar atá leagtha amach sa Cheist Choitianta seo
Bonuses: A bonus of €300 is payable when you have completed 3 qualifying measures and a further €100 is payable on completion of a 4th measure
Bónais: Tá bónas €300 iníoctha nuair atá 3 bheart incháilithe curtha i gcrích ar theach, agus tá €100 breise iníoctha nuair a chuirtear an 4ú beart i gcrích
The full grant history of your home is taken into account when calculating whether a bonus is due
Cuirtear san áireamh stair iomlán na deontas atá faighte i dtaobh do thí nuair atá cinneadh á dhéanamh faoi bhónas a bheith dlite nó gan é a bheith dlite
A BER does not count as a measure when calculating entitlement to a bonus
Ní chuirtear BER san áireamh mar bheart agus cáilíocht le haghaidh bónais á ríomh

You can apply online or else download an application form (pdf)
Is féidir iarratas ar líne a dhéanamh nó foirm iarratais (pdf) a íoslódáil
Online applications will get a response within 3 working days
Gheobhaidh iarratais ar líne freagra laistigh 3 lá
Postal applications will get a response within 20 working days
Gheobhaidh iarratais phoist freagra laistigh 20 lá oibre
